name: Escape from moles nest
description:
after being captured by moles for disputes by ants, now the little armadillo needs to escape the mole's nest.

how to play: use A and D to rotate the armadillo, press and hold space to load the power bar and then immediately click with the left mouse button to shoot. You can stop the armadillo in movement by clicking again with the left mouse button. Eat yellow ants to restore life.
